job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our cloud solutions are enablers of the digital transformation for business and our normal life. One of the enabling technologies for the digital transformation is cloud computing, this will enable a completely other way of working for the business.

   To support this, NXP-IT formed a Cloud Center of Excellence (Cloud CoE) reporting directly into the CIO. The Cloud CoE's goal is to enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT) - maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk. This team is recognized as the industry leading Cloud Center of Excellence for the high-tech industry.

   The Cloud CoE is responsible for defining Strategy and policy for cloud computing, driving, and implementing cloud services and platforms, running proof of concepts, piloting emerging cloud technologies (e.g. GenAI, Machine Learning) and supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies (including organizational change).

   As a Cloud engineer you are challenged to build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products in line with vision and stakeholder expectation. You possess a good balance between technical proficiency, business understanding with communication skills. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of cloud computing and technology systems. You should have a positive attitude and communication skills to effectively share your knowledge.

   Your Responsibilities

     * Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products, adhering to the compliancy and security guardrails.
     * Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services, including documentation.
     * Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products.
     * Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery to ensure the quality of our products and services. You built it , you run it
     * Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
     * Be evangelist of Cloud computing to the rest of NXP
     * Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies (AWS, Azure)
     * Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
     * Actively participate in communities / forums / guilds on cloud computing and data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning) (both external and internal to NXP)

   Our team
     * The Cloud CoE is a team of dedicated and passionate IT professionals. The team is around 30 people which are in Eindhoven the Netherlands and in Bangalore, India
     * The Cloud CoE consists for Cloud platform team including enabling role and Cloud Data platform team including enabling role.
job_details.full_text:
Cloud Engineer

Our cloud solutions are enablers of the digital transformation for business and our normal life. One of the enabling technologies for the digital transformation is cloud computing, this will enable a completely other way of working for the business.

   To support this, NXP-IT formed a Cloud Center of Excellence (Cloud CoE) reporting directly into the CIO. The Cloud CoE's goal is to enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT) - maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk. This team is recognized as the industry leading Cloud Center of Excellence for the high-tech industry.

   The Cloud CoE is responsible for defining Strategy and policy for cloud computing, driving, and implementing cloud services and platforms, running proof of concepts, piloting emerging cloud technologies (e.g. GenAI, Machine Learning) and supporting business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies (including organizational change).

   As a Cloud engineer you are challenged to build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products in line with vision and stakeholder expectation. You possess a good balance between technical proficiency, business understanding with communication skills. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of cloud computing and technology systems. You should have a positive attitude and communication skills to effectively share your knowledge.

   Your Responsibilities

     * Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products, adhering to the compliancy and security guardrails.
     * Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services, including documentation.
     * Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products.
     * Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery to ensure the quality of our products and services. You built it , you run it
     * Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
     * Be evangelist of Cloud computing to the rest of NXP
     * Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies (AWS, Azure)
     * Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
     * Actively participate in communities / forums / guilds on cloud computing and data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning) (both external and internal to NXP)

   Our team
     * The Cloud CoE is a team of dedicated and passionate IT professionals. The team is around 30 people which are in Eindhoven the Netherlands and in Bangalore, India
     * The Cloud CoE consists for Cloud platform team including enabling role and Cloud Data platform team including enabling role.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on cloud infrastructure, automation, and CI/CD pipelines, with only a mention of piloting emerging technologies like GenAI and Machine Learning. It lacks the core responsibilities and specific technologies associated with either an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: Cloud solutions are enablers of the digital transformation for business
enable accelerated and sustainable adoption of cloud across the enterprise (both business and IT)
maximizing the ability to realize its benefits while reducing risk
support business-initiatives in adapting cloud technologies
in line with vision and stakeholder expectation
good balance between technical proficiency, business understanding with communication skills
Be evangelist of Cloud computing to the rest of NXP
Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of how cloud technology serves business goals, the importance of stakeholder alignment, and the need to communicate the value of cloud to the wider organization.

phrases: re-usable cloud data products
data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning)
job_tasks.justification: Mentions the creation of 'cloud data products' and participation in communities related to 'data engineering', suggesting some involvement in data infrastructure, though not the primary focus.

phrases: piloting emerging cloud technologies (e.g. GenAI, Machine Learning)
data solutions (e.g. data engineering, analytics, machine learning)
job_tasks.justification: The job description mentions 'piloting' GenAI and Machine Learning as emerging technologies, and participation in communities related to 'machine learning', but it does not describe core responsibilities in building, training, or fine-tuning models.

phrases: build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products
Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform and cloud products
Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines, re-usable cloud data products, and underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services, including documentation.
Developing and maintaining ( incl lifecycle management) re-usable cloud products.
You built it , you run it
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building and maintaining cloud platforms, products, and CI/CD pipelines, which involves software development principles for infrastructure and services.

phrases: operate a cloud platforms and cloud products
Design, implement and maintain a fully automated cloud platform
Design, implement, and maintain CI/CD pipelines
underlying enabling tooling for Cloud based IT services
Work in DevOps / Scrum settings and apply techniques of continuous verification & delivery
Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
You built it , you run it
lifecycle management
job_tasks.justification: Strong emphasis on operating, automating, and maintaining cloud platforms and services, including CI/CD, DevOps practices, and responding to technical issues, which aligns with operations engineering principles.

phrases: communication skills
effectively share your knowledge
Pro-actively collaborate with other IT teams and business teams
Actively participate in communities / forums / guilds
Stay up to speed with the newest Cloud technologies
piloting emerging cloud technologies
build and operate a cloud platforms and cloud products
Design, implement and maintain
Respond to technical issues in a professional and timely manner
You built it , you run it
Be evangelist of Cloud computing
You built it , you run it
